description: Jessie and his three friends Zackary Pierce, Steve Boston and Patrick Fisher, take a dip in the pool out back -- without their bathing suits. Jessie begs Erik Rhodes (in a non-sexual role) to join them, but he wisely refuses. Jessie goes after him, leaving Zackary, Steve and Patrick to their own devices and in no time the three quickly begin having sex, culminating in an impressive double-penetration and generous cumshots all around.
title: The Farmer's Son, Scene #01
